page.title: 10MIDLAND SCHOOL BANK cont.
page.content: The Midland Bank gave the School a donation of Â£100 which was in appreciation of the school opening the bank, the first such operation in the Tiverton area. With the Â£100 the school purchased a printer for the BBC Micro. On the first day of opening nearly Â£200 was deposited by the children for either a Griffin Saver Account or the ordinary School Bank Account. Those with Griffin Saver Accounts received extra interest and a sports bag with various useful items, while the School Bank Savers received a maths set, for use in school, and a Bank Account file .
